name: Everyday Joe
description:
In this game you will be living as Joe. Our everyday man going through his chores.

This game was made for the "102$ Adventure Game Challenge", a jam where you had to make games with ethical dilemmas. So, how will your Joe surpass the dilemmas that await him? How will other people Joes confront them? There's only one way to find out.

(No Joe was hurt in the making of this game)
